text: Meghan Markle Flies in to Chicago To Complete UK Visa Application Meghan Markle Flies In to Chicago to Complete UK Visa Application EXCLUSIVE Meghan Markle was back in the States this week to take a major step in becoming a permanent UK citizen ahead of her wedding to Prince Harry. Eyewitnesses tell us Meghan attempted to be as incognito as possible - - with 4 bodyguards in tow - - when she entered the VFS Global UK Visa Application Centre Thursday in Chicago. We're told she was there to finalize her application for a UK visa. The whole thing only took about 10 minutes, and the entire office was cleared for her. We're told she was friendly with the staff. As for her disguise - - shades and a White Sox cap to blend in
